ComparableDICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode
public class DICOMFieldDocumentTreeNode
extends FieldDocumentTreeNode

This class represents a node in the DICOMFieldDocumentTree and contains the term.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gerald van Veldhuijsen
